mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(a.id) checkOnWorkNum FROM check_work a WHERE date_format(a.check_date, '%Y-%m') = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m') AND a.state = '1' AND a.create_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(a.id) diskCloudFileNum FROM file_catelog_papers a WHERE a.create_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(a.id) forumNum FROM forum_content a WHERE a.create_id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(a.id) knowledgeNum FROM knowlg_content a WHERE a.create_id = #{userId} AND a.state = '2'
SELECT a.id, a.type_name name FROM sys_notice_type a WHERE a.state = 2 AND a.parent_id = '0' ORDER BY a.order_by ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.id, a.title, CONVERT (a.real_lines_time, CHAR) linesTime, a.create_name createName, d.type_name typeName FROM sys_notice a, sys_notice_user c, sys_notice_type d WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.notice_id = a.id AND a.second_type_id = d.id AND a.state = 2 AND a.send_type = 2 AND a.type_id = #{typeId} UNION ALL SELECT a.id, a.title, CONVERT (a.real_lines_time, CHAR) linesTime, a.create_name createName, d.type_name typeName FROM sys_notice a, sys_notice_type d WHERE a.second_type_id = d.id AND a.state = 2 AND a.send_type = 1 AND a.type_id = #{typeId}) a ORDER BY a.linesTime DESC LIMIT 8

SELECT a.id, a.forum_desc `desc`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tag_name,'-',id) from forum_tag where INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.tag_id, ','), CONCAT(',', id, ','))) tagName, a.forum_title title, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM forum_comment b WHERE a.id = b.forum_id) commentNum, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, b.user_photo userPhoto, b.id userId FROM forum_content a LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff b ON b.user_id = a.create_id WHERE a.state = '1' AND (a.type = '1' OR (a.type = '2' AND a.create_id = #{userId})) AND a.anonymous = '1' AND a.id in (SELECT t.id FROM(select DISTINCT(forum_id) id from forum_hot ORDER BY update_time desc LIMIT 6)t) UNION ALL SELECT a.id, a.forum_desc `desc`, (select GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT tag_name,'-',id) from forum_tag where INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.tag_id, ','), CONCAT(',', id, ','))) tagName, a.forum_title title, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM forum_comment b WHERE a.id = b.forum_id) commentNum, CONVERT(a.create_time, char) createTime, '../../assets/images/anonymousphoto.jpg' userPhoto, '' userId FROM forum_content a WHERE a.state = '1' AND (a.type = '1' OR (a.type = '2' AND a.create_id = #{userId})) AND a.anonymous = '2' AND a.id in (SELECT t.id FROM(select DISTINCT(forum_id) id from forum_hot ORDER BY update_time desc LIMIT 6)t)

SELECT a.id, a.title, b.`name` typeName, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') createTime FROM knowlg_content a LEFT JOIN knowlg_type b ON a.type_id = b.id WHERE a.state = 2 ORDER BY a.examine_time DESC LIMIT 8
